sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.3%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble Company registers a 4.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 0.7%.
Chevron is lower by about 8.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are International Business Machines ( IBM ), trading down 0.5%, and Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading up 1.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
